Text: Sports Cards Collectibles AuctionOnline Auction Site Dedicated to Sports Cards and Collectibles Website Nowadays one of the best places to buy sportscards and collectibles is in online auctions It is exciting to bid in auctions and you can almost always find great deals The problem with most online auctions is they sell EVERYTHING What collectors need is a website designed specifically for them That is where we come in SCC Auctions is an established auction site that has been around for years with all the features of sites such as eBay but without the expensive cost We also offer many additional features that other sites cant offer such as Fast growing with hundreds of new customers EVERYDAY MultiBidding Bidding on many cards at once Owned and operated by collectors Cost A great selection of cards for far less than the competition You can make money by referring your friends to us Book value for every card listed Convenient closing times Fast superior invoicing Costs less to sell on SCC Auctions month for unlimited items Advanced search features including searching by book value ContestsSpecials Be rewarded for simply participating Free cards We start some cards out with a bid of ZERO For more indepth details of our features and advantages please go to whychooseshtml SCC Auctions offers a wide selection of cards and collectibles including Memorabilia cards Bat Jersey Base Helmet etc Autographed cards and collectibles Rookie cards Serial numbered cards Professionally graded items PSA BGS SGC etc To check out our current selection visit our website at Please note we are currently adding new sellers and new products all the time so if you collect something we currently dont carry you should still register Tell us what you are looking for and we can help Thanks for you time The Collectors and Dealers of SCC Auctions Removal Procedure You were sent this email because it was indicated to us that you might be interested in our website If that is not the case we apologize for any intrusion This email is a one time mailing so you need to do NOTHING You will not be contacted again
